title: Midnight Truth
body:
- The one where Y/N is a mermaid.

 Masterlist

 A/N: ik I’m not active at all, I’m really trying to though! Plus, my last piece of writing was straight off smut but I decided to nit write them anymore. So, if you have anything for me to write other than smut send me! Now enjoy!!

It was an Autumn night. Chilly air blew past Y/N as she stood naked in front of the lighted pool. The cold air wasn’t bothering her at all, in fact she was planning to jump in to the ice like cold water in front of her, but she didn’t know if she should. It had been a long time, since she did that….almost seven years - she realized. She glanced at the huge clock in the living room.

11:24

Harry wasn’t supposed to come ‘till 1. He had texted her saying he got stuck with some work in studio. Even though he told her to go to sleep and not wait for him, she was there doing the most unexpected thing that Harry could have ever imagined. Y/N slowly walked towards the pool.

She shouldn’t, she had left that life long ago.

But, she couldn’t stop herself. There was something pulling her towards the water. And without another thought she jumped. The cold water pierced through her skin like needles but she could never care less.

Y/N swept her legs together as she dived a little deeper in the pool, almost touching the floor. At first, it was nothing -Y/N almost thought nothing was going to happen, but then there was something. It was a sensation, a very familiar sensation, a sensation she felt only once in her life, but she could never forget it.

It was her legs first - two joining, to become one; skin starting to change into her shabby pink scales from her torso as it went all the way down to her tail.

Then it was her chest - scales trailing fast from her torso it went up to cover her chest, leaving only a little trace of scales on her stomach and back. The sensation went up to her face as scales appeared on the either sides of her face and her forehead.

Then it was her neck - skin stretched, as her muscles tore apart making three bloody hollows appear on both side as if a bear had clawed her neck with its long nails.

Y/N could breathe again, she could see clearly again.

In one swift motion she swept up into the air and dived right back in the water.

Y/N felt different, Y/N felt free - happy.

Those were the two things Y/N never thought she’d ever feel going back to water.

Y/N had an interesting life in ocean, but she was never fond of it. They used to live in a very organized colony and they were restricted in a certain area for the sake of the merpeople and human.

However, Y/N didn’t like it there. Maybe because she didn’t get along with her peers, because they thought she was mental or maybe because that place reminded of her grand father who died when she was 10. She only had him. Her parents went missing while they were trying to help some human in their way to destination.

Since the day of her grandfather’s death, she was just waiting to turn 18 so she could get out of that place. There was an enchantment, which kept any merperson under 18 within the boundary of their area, but after 18 the enchantment breaks and they can get out of the place any time they liked. So, the second Y/N turned 18 she took all the things she needed and swam away.

That place made her feel suffocated. Everyone looking at her as is she was an human who somehow stumbled there, it just made her feel small.

After her grandfather’s death, Y/N had found his notebook, where he wrote all types of potions he had found for helping the merpeople. There Y/N saw the potion which kept merpeople in human form even after coming in contact with water. This had made her more determined to swim away.

All the ingredients were simple, the only complex thing was the magic but her grandfather had taught her that when she was very young. So, Y/N didn’t have much problem making the potion.

Y/N had swam for about seven days straight before she came near to any shores at all. First few days she just observed the humans, so she could survive at least one day - but if she was honest, she was just terrified. However on the third night she finally got the courage and got on the quieter side of the shore to let herself dry to become a human.

Y/N needed almost the whole night to get in her human form. She didn’t have any dry clothes and her waist length long hair wasn’t helping her at all. Later she just pulled her hair up in a bun, so it didn’t wet her body. She had her scales around her face but they weren’t much visible. Besides her gills always disappeared when her head was above water…..she looked normal, at least she thought she did.

After she changed completely, her first target was to find some clothes before the sun rose. Looking at the human for three days and two nights, she understood enough that wearing clothes were very important for them.

Y/N didn’t have to struggle much to find clothes she had easily found a dress lying on a picnic blanket as the owner was far off, partying with many other human. However, her biggest struggle was walking. It was her first time walking after all. At first she couldn’t even standstill, but after a while she was fine, even though she felt her legs will give out any moment, she was able to walk into the city without falling.

First few months had been really hard for her, she didn’t have a place to go, she didn’t know how to talk human tongue and she didn’t know how to act like them. But, Y/N was a magical creature after all; she learned their tongue quite fast and even got a job in a cafe and understood how to act like human.

Y/N somehow survived few months working in different places and luckily in her third month of being a human, she found another merperson. Later, Y/N started to live with her and two other merpersons -her life had become much easier from then and she didn’t look back at the ocean ever again.

Y/N hadn’t swam in a while, it had been so long since she did that. Not even as a human with her grandfather’s potion she didn’t risk to swim in public and she never had a swimming pool.

Y/N slowly swam in the pool for a while before lying down on the tile of the pool.

Heart beats fast

Colours and promises

How to be brave?

How can I love when I’m afraid to fall?

But watching you stand alone

All of my doubt

Suddenly goes away somehow

One step closer

I have died every day waiting for you

Darling, don’t be afraid

I have loved you for a thousand years

I’ll love you for a thousand more .

Y/N started to sing her favorite song as she looked up at the sky, stars twinkling brightly.

___

It was 1:32 in the morning. Harry slowly walked inside his house. He had noticed that his house was completely lit from outside. So, Harry was quite surprised for not finding Y/N on couch or in the kitchen. Harry was about to go upstairs, thinking she had went to sleep but then he heard a voice. It was coming from the pool. The voice was muffled but he could tell the voice was beautiful, maybe the most beautiful voice he ever heard.

Maybe Y/N’s phone fell into the pool and she was trying to get it, without getting herself wet.

Harry knew how much Y/N hated water.

Only did he know, Y/N spent 18 years of her life in water.

Harry slowly made his way to the pool area, but to his surprise Y/N wasn’t there with a long stick trying to get her phone.

Harry scanned the pool area, and then his eyes fell on the pile of clothes. Even from the distance he could tell, the clothes belonged to Y/N. Adrenaline rushed through his veins. He hurried towards the pool and hovered over it.

However, the thing he saw, he thought never existed. It was Y/N, but not Y/N completely - It had a tail, it had gills, it had scales. It was half fish and half Y/N.

For a second he thought it was those tails one could buy in the market, but it looked so real. It looked like the tail originated from the very skin of Y/N’s torso. Besides, Y/N was in the water and was singing, Harry knew no human could do that.

If she wasn’t human what was she?

It was currently singing with its eyes closed. If it had been anyone’s face other than Y/N’s, he would’ve run and would’ve called the police already. But, he couldn’t, it had Y/N’s face.

Harry saw it open it’s eyes and look directly at him, revealing the black orbs he had once fell in love with. The warmth and happiness, Harry always felt looking at those eyes - he didn’t feel it anymore instead, he felt cold and fear.

Harry stumbled back as he saw it rise up towards him.

None of them said anything for a while. Harry just looked at it terrified. He noticed its gills disappeared just the moment it came out of water and even with the scales it looked just as beautiful as Y/N, if not more.

“Harry?” It said, her voice was also like Y/N’s, timid and soft.

“Who are you?” Harry said before even realizing.

“I’m Y/N, your Y/N,” It said, hurt was evident on its face.

Harry could believe it -it looked exactly like Y/N. But, he didn’t understand. He didn’t know what it was. Of course, there are so many fairy tales about them, but they are fairy tales, not real life!

Harry didn’t know what to feel, he didn’t know if he should be scared of it, if he should believe or if he should search for Y/N….with legs and without scales. He just didn’t understand.

“Wait,” It said ever so softly that Harry almost didn’t hear.

It went back into the pool and swam to other end of the pool, where Y/N’s clothes were scattered around the floor.

The half fish marched itself up at the edge of the pool as it crawled up to the clothes.

Harry got on his feet and slowly went towards the creature, who looked just like Y/N. Harry was still, terrified, he didn’t still know if it did something to Y/N or not. He needed answers.

The creature tied her hair up started to dry its chest by Y/N’s clothes. Harry looked at it curiously. After a while he realized the scales on the creature’s chest started to disappear and revealed a pair of breasts Harry had seen many times before.

“Can you bring me a towel,” It asked.

Harry slowly nodded. Harry understood few things but he was still very confused. Harry quickly grabbed a towel from the cabinet on the other side of the pool and handed it to the interesting creature. The whole time he was looking at her, in afraid that he might miss something or that it might disappear.

It wiped on her scale from her torso to the very end of her tail while Harry it’s every move sitting on one of the pool sits.

After a while Y/N stopped and used the towel to cover her chest and looked up at Harry.

Harry didn’t quite understand at first, but then it was her tail shrinking and slowly disappearing as two of her legs reappeared.

Harry’s mouth was agape. He didn’t know what to think. He looked at Y/N to her legs, it really was her.

“Wh- ho,” Harry slumped down next to her. He couldn’t even say a full word.

He was utterly speechless.

“Harry I should have told you this long before,” Y/N took Harry’s hand.

“I’m a merperson,” Y/N stated looking straight in Harry’s eyes. He was still confused, Y/N could see it.

“Mermaid really, as you guys call it,” Y/N said.

“I still don’t understand, then what are you doing here? Are there other people like you? How could you like change, do you need potions like the little mermaid?” There were so many question in Harry’s mind, but the most important was - “You love me, don’t you?” Harry’s voice was desperate. He really didn’t want his last four years to be a lie. He loved her. He loved her more than anything and he didn’t care if she was a half fish. But, if she didn’t love him -Harry didn’t know what he’d do. It hurt just by thinking about it.

“Of course, I love you,” Y/N said instantly as she took his face in her hand. “I love you more than anything, Y/N inched closure to Harry, but she didn’t kiss her.

“I’m sorry for not telling you, I was just scared you’d leave me,” Y/N said softly.

“Never love,” Harry smiled softly. “I love you, still I don’t understand anything,” Harry stated.

The next two hours, Y/N spent answering all of Harry’s questions. Even though few of Harry’s questions were stupid,but Y/N couldn’t really blame him, he was very confused afterall.

“Can I see you like that again?” Harry finally said after a long silence. He needed time to consume everything Y/N had said.

Y/N said nothing but smiled brightly before letting go of the towel and jumping in the pool.

Harry saw her transform from above the water. It was a miracle in Harry’s eyes - it was beautiful.

Y/N poked her head out of water before gesturing Harry to jump in with her. Harry spent no time to strip in his boxer and jump in with her.

Rest of the night they spent swimming in the pool and Harry caressing her tail every now and then.

“You are beautiful, in just every way possible,” he would whisper.

Y/N needed almost the whole night to get in her human form. She didn’t have any dry clothes and her waist length long hair wasn’t helping her at all. Later she just pulled her hair up in a bun, so it didn’t wet her body. She had her scales around her face but they weren’t much visible. Besides her gills always disappeared when her head was above water…..she looked normal, at least she thought she did.

After she changed completely, her first target was to find some clothes before the sun rose. Looking at the human for three days and two nights, she understood enough that wearing clothes were very important for them.

Y/N didn’t have to struggle much to find clothes she had easily found a dress lying on a picnic blanket as the owner was far off, partying with many other human. However, her biggest struggle was walking. It was her first time walking after all. At first she couldn’t even standstill, but after a while she was fine, even though she felt her legs will give out any moment, she was able to walk into the city without falling.

First few months had been really hard for her, she didn’t have a place to go, she didn’t know how to talk human tongue and she didn’t know how to act like them. But, Y/N was a magical creature after all; she learned their tongue quite fast and even got a job in a cafe and understood how to act like human.

Y/N somehow survived few months working in different places and luckily in her third month of being a human, she found another merperson. Later, Y/N started to live with her and two other merpersons -her life had become much easier from then and she didn’t look back at the ocean ever again.

Y/N hadn’t swam in a while, it had been so long since she did that. Not even as a human with her grandfather’s potion she didn’t risk to swim in public and she never had a swimming pool.

Y/N slowly swam in the pool for a while before lying down on the tile of the pool.

Heart beats fast

Colours and promises

How to be brave?

How can I love when I’m afraid to fall?

But watching you stand alone

All of my doubt

Suddenly goes away somehow

One step closer

I have died every day waiting for you

Darling, don’t be afraid

I have loved you for a thousand years

I’ll love you for a thousand more .

Y/N started to sing her favorite song as she looked up at the sky, stars twinkling brightly.

___

It was 1:32 in the morning. Harry slowly walked inside his house. He had noticed that his house was completely lit from outside. So, Harry was quite surprised for not finding Y/N on couch or in the kitchen. Harry was about to go upstairs, thinking she had went to sleep but then he heard a voice. It was coming from the pool. The voice was muffled but he could tell the voice was beautiful, maybe the most beautiful voice he ever heard.

Maybe Y/N’s phone fell into the pool and she was trying to get it, without getting herself wet.

Harry knew how much Y/N hated water.

Only did he know, Y/N spent 18 years of her life in water.

Harry slowly made his way to the pool area, but to his surprise Y/N wasn’t there with a long stick trying to get her phone.

Harry scanned the pool area, and then his eyes fell on the pile of clothes. Even from the distance he could tell, the clothes belonged to Y/N. Adrenaline rushed through his veins. He hurried towards the pool and hovered over it.

However, the thing he saw, he thought never existed. It was Y/N, but not Y/N completely - It had a tail, it had gills, it had scales. It was half fish and half Y/N.

For a second he thought it was those tails one could buy in the market, but it looked so real. It looked like the tail originated from the very skin of Y/N’s torso. Besides, Y/N was in the water and was singing, Harry knew no human could do that.

If she wasn’t human what was she?

It was currently singing with its eyes closed. If it had been anyone’s face other than Y/N’s, he would’ve run and would’ve called the police already. But, he couldn’t, it had Y/N’s face.

Harry saw it open it’s eyes and look directly at him, revealing the black orbs he had once fell in love with. The warmth and happiness, Harry always felt looking at those eyes - he didn’t feel it anymore instead, he felt cold and fear.

Harry stumbled back as he saw it rise up towards him.

None of them said anything for a while. Harry just looked at it terrified. He noticed its gills disappeared just the moment it came out of water and even with the scales it looked just as beautiful as Y/N, if not more.

“Harry?” It said, her voice was also like Y/N’s, timid and soft.

“Who are you?” Harry said before even realizing.

“I’m Y/N, your Y/N,” It said, hurt was evident on its face.

Harry could believe it -it looked exactly like Y/N. But, he didn’t understand. He didn’t know what it was. Of course, there are so many fairy tales about them, but they are fairy tales, not real life!

Harry didn’t know what to feel, he didn’t know if he should be scared of it, if he should believe or if he should search for Y/N….with legs and without scales. He just didn’t understand.

“Wait,” It said ever so softly that Harry almost didn’t hear.

It went back into the pool and swam to other end of the pool, where Y/N’s clothes were scattered around the floor.

The half fish marched itself up at the edge of the pool as it crawled up to the clothes.

Harry got on his feet and slowly went towards the creature, who looked just like Y/N. Harry was still, terrified, he didn’t still know if it did something to Y/N or not. He needed answers.

The creature tied her hair up started to dry its chest by Y/N’s clothes. Harry looked at it curiously. After a while he realized the scales on the creature’s chest started to disappear and revealed a pair of breasts Harry had seen many times before.

“Can you bring me a towel,” It asked.

Harry slowly nodded. Harry understood few things but he was still very confused. Harry quickly grabbed a towel from the cabinet on the other side of the pool and handed it to the interesting creature. The whole time he was looking at her, in afraid that he might miss something or that it might disappear.

It wiped on her scale from her torso to the very end of her tail while Harry it’s every move sitting on one of the pool sits.

After a while Y/N stopped and used the towel to cover her chest and looked up at Harry.

Harry didn’t quite understand at first, but then it was her tail shrinking and slowly disappearing as two of her legs reappeared.

Harry’s mouth was agape. He didn’t know what to think. He looked at Y/N to her legs, it really was her.

“Wh- ho,” Harry slumped down next to her. He couldn’t even say a full word.

He was utterly speechless.

“Harry I should have told you this long before,” Y/N took Harry’s hand.

“I’m a merperson,” Y/N stated looking straight in Harry’s eyes. He was still confused, Y/N could see it.

“Mermaid really, as you guys call it,” Y/N said.

“I still don’t understand, then what are you doing here? Are there other people like you? How could you like change, do you need potions like the little mermaid?” There were so many question in Harry’s mind, but the most important was - “You love me, don’t you?” Harry’s voice was desperate. He really didn’t want his last four years to be a lie. He loved her. He loved her more than anything and he didn’t care if she was a half fish. But, if she didn’t love him -Harry didn’t know what he’d do. It hurt just by thinking about it.

“Of course, I love you,” Y/N said instantly as she took his face in her hand. “I love you more than anything, Y/N inched closure to Harry, but she didn’t kiss her.

“I’m sorry for not telling you, I was just scared you’d leave me,” Y/N said softly.

“Never love,” Harry smiled softly. “I love you, still I don’t understand anything,” Harry stated.

The next two hours, Y/N spent answering all of Harry’s questions. Even though few of Harry’s questions were stupid,but Y/N couldn’t really blame him, he was very confused afterall.

“Can I see you like that again?” Harry finally said after a long silence. He needed time to consume everything Y/N had said.

Y/N said nothing but smiled brightly before letting go of the towel and jumping in the pool.

Harry saw her transform from above the water. It was a miracle in Harry’s eyes - it was beautiful.

Y/N poked her head out of water before gesturing Harry to jump in with her. Harry spent no time to strip in his boxer and jump in with her.

Rest of the night they spent swimming in the pool and Harry caressing her tail every now and then.

“You are beautiful, in just every way possible,” he would whisper.
trail.content:
- The one where Y/N is a mermaid.

 Masterlist

 A/N: ik I’m not active at all, I’m really trying to though! Plus, my last piece of writing was straight off smut but I decided to nit write them anymore. So, if you have anything for me to write other than smut send me! Now enjoy!!

It was an Autumn night. Chilly air blew past Y/N as she stood naked in front of the lighted pool. The cold air wasn’t bothering her at all, in fact she was planning to jump in to the ice like cold water in front of her, but she didn’t know if she should. It had been a long time, since she did that….almost seven years - she realized. She glanced at the huge clock in the living room.

11:24

Harry wasn’t supposed to come ‘till 1. He had texted her saying he got stuck with some work in studio. Even though he told her to go to sleep and not wait for him, she was there doing the most unexpected thing that Harry could have ever imagined. Y/N slowly walked towards the pool.

She shouldn’t, she had left that life long ago.

But, she couldn’t stop herself. There was something pulling her towards the water. And without another thought she jumped. The cold water pierced through her skin like needles but she could never care less.

Y/N swept her legs together as she dived a little deeper in the pool, almost touching the floor. At first, it was nothing -Y/N almost thought nothing was going to happen, but then there was something. It was a sensation, a very familiar sensation, a sensation she felt only once in her life, but she could never forget it.

It was her legs first - two joining, to become one; skin starting to change into her shabby pink scales from her torso as it went all the way down to her tail.

Then it was her chest - scales trailing fast from her torso it went up to cover her chest, leaving only a little trace of scales on her stomach and back. The sensation went up to her face as scales appeared on the either sides of her face and her forehead.

Then it was her neck - skin stretched, as her muscles tore apart making three bloody hollows appear on both side as if a bear had clawed her neck with its long nails.

Y/N could breathe again, she could see clearly again.

In one swift motion she swept up into the air and dived right back in the water.

Y/N felt different, Y/N felt free - happy.

Those were the two things Y/N never thought she’d ever feel going back to water.

Y/N had an interesting life in ocean, but she was never fond of it. They used to live in a very organized colony and they were restricted in a certain area for the sake of the merpeople and human.

However, Y/N didn’t like it there. Maybe because she didn’t get along with her peers, because they thought she was mental or maybe because that place reminded of her grand father who died when she was 10. She only had him. Her parents went missing while they were trying to help some human in their way to destination.

Since the day of her grandfather’s death, she was just waiting to turn 18 so she could get out of that place. There was an enchantment, which kept any merperson under 18 within the boundary of their area, but after 18 the enchantment breaks and they can get out of the place any time they liked. So, the second Y/N turned 18 she took all the things she needed and swam away.

That place made her feel suffocated. Everyone looking at her as is she was an human who somehow stumbled there, it just made her feel small.

After her grandfather’s death, Y/N had found his notebook, where he wrote all types of potions he had found for helping the merpeople. There Y/N saw the potion which kept merpeople in human form even after coming in contact with water. This had made her more determined to swim away.

All the ingredients were simple, the only complex thing was the magic but her grandfather had taught her that when she was very young. So, Y/N didn’t have much problem making the potion.

Y/N had swam for about seven days straight before she came near to any shores at all. First few days she just observed the humans, so she could survive at least one day - but if she was honest, she was just terrified. However on the third night she finally got the courage and got on the quieter side of the shore to let herself dry to become a human.

Y/N needed almost the whole night to get in her human form. She didn’t have any dry clothes and her waist length long hair wasn’t helping her at all. Later she just pulled her hair up in a bun, so it didn’t wet her body. She had her scales around her face but they weren’t much visible. Besides her gills always disappeared when her head was above water…..she looked normal, at least she thought she did.

After she changed completely, her first target was to find some clothes before the sun rose. Looking at the human for three days and two nights, she understood enough that wearing clothes were very important for them.

Y/N didn’t have to struggle much to find clothes she had easily found a dress lying on a picnic blanket as the owner was far off, partying with many other human. However, her biggest struggle was walking. It was her first time walking after all. At first she couldn’t even standstill, but after a while she was fine, even though she felt her legs will give out any moment, she was able to walk into the city without falling.

First few months had been really hard for her, she didn’t have a place to go, she didn’t know how to talk human tongue and she didn’t know how to act like them. But, Y/N was a magical creature after all; she learned their tongue quite fast and even got a job in a cafe and understood how to act like human.

Y/N somehow survived few months working in different places and luckily in her third month of being a human, she found another merperson. Later, Y/N started to live with her and two other merpersons -her life had become much easier from then and she didn’t look back at the ocean ever again.

Y/N hadn’t swam in a while, it had been so long since she did that. Not even as a human with her grandfather’s potion she didn’t risk to swim in public and she never had a swimming pool.

Y/N slowly swam in the pool for a while before lying down on the tile of the pool.

Heart beats fast

Colours and promises

How to be brave?

How can I love when I’m afraid to fall?

But watching you stand alone

All of my doubt

Suddenly goes away somehow

One step closer

I have died every day waiting for you

Darling, don’t be afraid

I have loved you for a thousand years

I’ll love you for a thousand more .

Y/N started to sing her favorite song as she looked up at the sky, stars twinkling brightly.

___

Take a deeper dive into the world of London Calling with this standalone series

The New Year (Death Cab for Cutie)

2017 is coming to a close and I feel like it just started yesterday. It’s been a wacky and wonderful year that I honestly have a hard time believing that it was my life. I watched the people I love…

summary: Yeah yeah Louis is in the studio writing songs, but am I the only one who noticed that he wore the exact same shirt when he went...
body:
Am I the only one who noticed ?

Yeah yeah Louis is in the studio writing songs, but am I the only one who noticed that he wore the exact same shirt when he went to a gay bar in Amsterdam a long time ago?

I went to Amsterdam without you,

and all I could do was think about you-

*cough* larry *chokes* is *dies* real.

Title: Write A Song For Us
Author: Liz
Chapter: 13/28    
Word Count: 1,529
Rating: MA
Genre: Romance, Angst
Warnings: Language, Sexual Situations
Summary: When A-list model Zac Hanson meets the newest it singer Harry Styles a whirlwind romance between the two blossoms.
